Prerequisite(s): 2 Roaring Mouse maneuvers
Range: Close (25 ft. + 5ft./2 levels)
Target: Allies within range
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

With a wink and a nod, your allies activate a secret formation. When you initiate this boost, allies within range may move up to their speed as a free action, even if it isn't their turn. After this movement is complete, if an ally affected by this boost is maintaining a Roaring Mouse stance, they may make an attack or initiate a strike with an initiation action of 1 standard action, so long as the attack or strike targets a creature with the tricked condition. A creature cannot benefit from the effects of this boost more than once per round, regardless of the source.
